metadata.description: This ruleset provides analysis of JBoss EAP 6 and RESTEasy 2 which needs to be replaced when migrating to JBoss EAP 7+ and RESTEasy 3+.

hint.title: RESTEasy 3 Cache Client package change
hint.message: Caching in the RESTEasy client framework in resteasy-jaxrs is replaced by caching in the JAX-RS 2.0 compliant resteasy-client module. Use `org.jboss.resteasy.client.jaxrs.cache` package instead of `org.jboss.resteasy.client.cache`.

hint.title: Deprecated class ClientRequest in RESTEasy 3
Deprecated class ClientResponse in RESTEasy 3
hint.message: Replace `org.jboss.resteasy.client.ClientResponse` class with `javax.ws.rs.core.Response`.

hint.title: Deprecated class org.jboss.resteasy.client.{type} in RESTEasy 3
hint.message: Replace this class with `org.jboss.resteasy.client.jaxrs.{type}`.

hint.title: Deprecated class EntityTypeFactory in RESTEasy 3
hint.message:
There is no direct replacement for `org.jboss.resteasy.client.EntityTypeFactory` class.
`org.jboss.resteasy.client.ClientResponse<T>` is a generic type in the RESTEasy client framework, but `org.jboss.resteasy.client.jaxrs.internal.ClientResponse` in the resteasy-client module is not, so `EntityTypeFactory` is no longer useful.

hint.title: Deprecated interface ClientExecutor in RESTEasy 3
hint.message: Replace the `org.jboss.resteasy.client.ClientExecutor` usage with `org.jboss.resteasy.client.jaxrs.ClientHttpEngine` class.

hint.title: Deprecated class ClientRequestFactory in RESTEasy 3
hint.message: Replace the `org.jboss.resteasy.client.ClientRequestFactory` usage with `org.jboss.resteasy.client.jaxrs.ResteasyClientBuilder` class.

hint.title: Deprecated exception ClientResponseFailure in RESTEasy 3
hint.message: Replace the `org.jboss.resteasy.client.ClientResponseFailure` with `javax.ws.rs.client.ResponseProcessingException` or with `javax.ws.rs.client.ProcessingException` or with `javax.ws.rs.client.WebApplicationException` class.

hint.title: RESTEasy 3 SPI Application Change for StringConverter
hint.message: Replace `org.jboss.resteasy.spi.StringConverter` by `javax.ws.rs.ext.ParamConverterProvider`.

hint.title: RESTEasy 3 SPI Application Changes for InjectorFactory
hint.message: There were multiple changes on adding/removing methods on `org.jboss.resteasy.spi.InjectorFactory`.

hint.title: Deprecated interface MessageBodyWriterInterceptor in RESTEasy 3
hint.message: The interface `org.jboss.resteasy.spi.interception.MessageBodyWriterInterceptor` is deprecated and you should use `javax.ws.rs.ext.WriterInterceptor` from JAX-RS API.

hint.title: Deprecated interface MessageBodyReaderInterceptor in RESTEasy 3
hint.message: The interface `org.jboss.resteasy.spi.interception.MessageBodyReaderInterceptor` is deprecated and you should use `javax.ws.rs.ext.ReaderInterceptor` from JAX-RS API.

hint.title: Deprecated interface MessageBodyWriterContext in RESTEasy 3
hint.message: The interface `org.jboss.resteasy.spi.interception.MessageBodyWriterContext` is replaced by the `javax.ws.rs.ext.WriterInterceptorContext` interface by JAX-RS 2.0 compliant interceptor facility.

hint.title: Deprecated class InterceptorRegistry in RESTEasy 3
hint.message: `org.jboss.resteasy.core.interception.InterceptorRegistry` is deprecated in favor of the JAX-RS 2.0 Interceptor and filter API.

hint.title: Deprecated interface InterceptorRegistryListener in RESTEasy 3
hint.message: `org.jboss.resteasy.core.interception.InterceptorRegistryListener` is deprecated in favor of the JAX-RS 2.0 Interceptor and filter API.

hint.title: Removed class ApacheHttpClientExecutor from in RESTEasy 3
hint.message: No direct replacement.

hint.title: Deprecated class SimpleServerCache in RESTEasy 3
hint.message: Use `org.jboss.resteasy.plugins.cache.server.InfinispanCache` instead of `org.jboss.resteasy.plugins.cache.server.SimpleServerCache`.

hint.title: Deprecated interface AcceptedByMethod in RESTEasy 3
hint.message: Use `javax.ws.rs.container.DynamicFeature` for Dynamic binding instead of implementing `org.jboss.resteasy.spi.interception.AcceptedByMethod` interface.

hint.title: Removed annotation ServerCached in RESTEasy 3
hint.message: Remove annotation `@org.jboss.resteasy.annotations.cache.ServerCached' as it was removed in RESTEasy 3.x.

hint.title: Deprecated class Link in RESTEasy 3
hint.message: Replaced by `javax.ws.rs.core.Link` in JAX-RS API.

hint.title: Deprecated interface ClientExecutionContext in RESTEasy 3
hint.message: `org.jboss.resteasy.spi.interception.ClientExecutionContext` is deprecated in favor of the JAX-RS 2.0 Interceptor and filter API.

hint.title: Deprecated interface ClientExecutionInterceptor in RESTEasy 3
hint.message: Use `javax.ws.rs.client.Invocation` instead of `org.jboss.resteasy.spi.interception.ClientExecutionInterceptor`. The RESTEasy interceptor facility introduced in release 2.x is replaced by the JAX-RS 2.0 compliant interceptor facility in release 3.0.x.

hint.title: ResteasyProviderFactory#add* methods were removed
hint.message: Most of the `org.jboss.resteasy.spi.ResteasyProviderFactory#add*` methods have been removed or made protected in RESTEasy 3.0. For example, the `addBuiltInMessageBodyReader()` and `addBuiltInMessageBodyWriter()` methods have been removed and the `addMessageBodyReader()` and `addMessageBodyWriter()` methods have been made protected. You should now use the `registerProvider()` and `registerProviderInstance()` methods.

link.title: RESTEasy removed/protected methods on ResteasyProviderFactory class

hint.title: Deprecated interface MessageBodyReaderContext in RESTEasy 3
hint.message: Use `javax.ws.rs.ext.ReaderInterceptorContext` instead of `org.jboss.resteasy.spi.interception.MessageBodyReaderContext`. The RESTEasy interceptor facility introduced in release 2.x is replaced by the JAX-RS 2.0 compliant interceptor facility in release 3.0.x.

hint.title: Deprecated interface PostProcessInterceptor in RESTEasy 3
hint.message: Use `javax.ws.rs.container.ContainerResponseFilter` instead of `org.jboss.resteasy.spi.interception.PostProcessInterceptor`. The RESTEasy interceptor facility introduced in release 2.x is replaced by the JAX-RS 2.0 compliant filters and interceptor facility in release 3.0.x.

hint.title: Deprecated interface PreProcessInterceptor in RESTEasy 3
hint.message: Use `javax.ws.rs.container.ContainerRequestFilter` instead of `org.jboss.resteasy.spi.interception.PreProcessInterceptor`. The RESTEasy interceptor facility introduced in release 2.x is replaced by the JAX-RS 2.0 compliant filters and interceptor facility in release 3.0.x.

hint.title: RESTEasy 3 SPI Registry changed
hint.message: There were multiple changes on adding/removing methods on `org.jboss.resteasy.spi.Registry`.

hint.title: Deprecated exception ForbiddenException in RESTEasy 3
hint.message: Replaced by `javax.ws.rs.ForbiddenException` in jaxrs-api module.

hint.title: Deprecated exception MethodNotAllowedException in RESTEasy 3
hint.message: Replaced by `javax.ws.rs.NotAllowedException` in jaxrs-api module.

hint.title: Deprecated exception NotAcceptableException in RESTEasy 3
hint.message: Replaced by `javax.ws.rs.NotAcceptableException` in jaxrs-api module.

hint.title: Deprecated exception NotFoundException in RESTEasy 3
hint.message: Replaced by `javax.ws.rs.NotFoundException` in jaxrs-api module.

hint.title: Deprecated exception UnauthorizedException in RESTEasy 3
hint.message: Replaced by `javax.ws.rs.NotAuthorizedException` in jaxrs-api module.

hint.title: Deprecated exception UnsupportedMediaTypeException in RESTEasy 3
hint.message: Replaced by `javax.ws.rs.NotSupportedException` in jaxrs-api module.

hint.title: Deprecated method ServerCookie#checkName in RESTEasy 3
hint.message: RESTEasy 3 deprecates method `org.jboss.resteasy.plugins.delegates.ServerCookie#checkName` without a replacement. It was deprecated in the original `org.apache.tomcat.util.http.ServerCookie` class which was a template for this method.

hint.title: Deprecated method JAXBContextWrapper#createValidator in RESTEasy 3
hint.message: Empty

hint.title: Deprecated method ResteasyHttpServletResponseWrapper#encodeRedirectUrl
hint.message: Replace method calls of `encodeRedirectUrl` with `encodeRedirectURL(String url)`.

hint.title: Deprecated ResteasyHttpServletResponseWrapper#encodeUrl method
hint.message: Replace `ResteasyHttpServletResponseWrapper#encodeUrl` with `ResteasyHttpServletResponseWrapper#encodeURL(String url)`.

hint.title: Deprecated method MultipartFormDataInputImpl#getFormData in RESTEasy 3
hint.message: `MultipartFormDataInputImpl#getFormData` method will be removed in the future. Use `MultipartFormDataInput#getFormDataMap()` instead.

hint.title: Deprecated method MultipartFormDataInput#getFormData in RESTEasy 3
hint.message: `MultipartFormDataInput#getFormData` method will be removed in the future. Use `MultipartFormDataInput#getFormDataMap()` instead.

hint.title: Deprecated method ResteasyHttpServletRequestWrapper.isRequestedSessionIdFromURL in RESTEasy 3
hint.message: As of Version 2.1 of the Java Servlet API, use `ResteasyHttpServletRequestWrapper.isRequestedSessionIdFromURL()` instead.

hint.title: Deprecated method SecureUnmarshaller#isValidating in RESTEasy 3
hint.message: Method `org.jboss.resteasy.plugins.providers.jaxb.SecureUnmarshaller#isValidating` is deprecated without a replacement.

hint.title: Deprecated method ServerCookie#maybeQuote in RESTEasy 3
hint.message: RESTEasy 3 deprecates method `org.jboss.resteasy.plugins.delegates.ServerCookie#maybeQuote` without a replacement. It was deprecated in the original `org.apache.tomcat.util.http.ServerCookie` class which was a template for this method.

hint.title: Deprecated method SecureUnmarshaller#setAdapter in RESTEasy 3
hint.message: Method `org.jboss.resteasy.plugins.providers.jaxb.SecureUnmarshaller#setAdapter` is deprecated in RESTEasy 3.

hint.title: Deprecated method ResteasyHttpServletResponseWrapper#setStatus in RESTEasy 3
hint.message: As of version 2.1, due to ambiguous meaning of the message parameter. To set a status code use `setStatus(int)` instead, to send an error with a description use `sendError(int, String)`. Sets the status code and message for this response.

hint.title: Deprecated method SecureUnmarshaller#setValidating in RESTEasy 3
hint.message: RESTEasy 3 deprecates method `org.jboss.resteasy.plugins.providers.jaxb.SecureUnmarshaller#setValidating` without a replacement.

hint.title: Deprecated method OAuthValidator#validateMessage in RESTEasy 3
hint.message: RESTEasy 3 deprecates `org.jboss.resteasy.auth.oauth.OAuthValidator#validateMessage` method without a replacement.
